io.smint.clapi.consumer.integration.core.authenticator

Interface ISmintIoAuthenticator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SmintIoAuthenticatorImpl

    public interface ISmintIoAuthenticator
    Authenticator to refresh authorization with Smint.io API.

    This authenticator uses the refresh token to renew the validity of the access token.

    OAuth 2.0 authorization

    Smint.io API utilizes OAuth to authorize access. The first authorization must be performed manually, because it requires user interaction. This initial authorization creates an Access Token, that must be provided to this library in an instance of IAuthTokenModel to acquired from IAuthTokenStorage. The access token is used to authorize access to the API. The OAuth protocol is used to ensure, that the created token is transmitted securely to the consumer and the access token expires after a small amount of time.

    Along the access token, a refresh token is being created. The refresh token's validity duration usually is much longer than that of the access token. It can be used to refresh the validity of the access token. So its security is very important.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ISmintIoAuthenticator refreshSmintIoToken(ISettingsModel settings, IAuthTokenStorage authTokenStorage)
      Renew the validity of the OAuth access token utilizing the refresh token.

    • Method Detail

      • refreshSmintIoToken

        ISmintIoAuthenticator refreshSmintIoToken(ISettingsModel settings,
                                          IAuthTokenStorage authTokenStorage)
                                   throws SmintIoAuthenticatorException
        Renew the validity of the OAuth access token utilizing the refresh token.
        Parameters:
        settings - The settings that contains the OAuth redirection URL and other invariant configuration data that might be necessary.
        authTokenStorage - a storage provider to read the current OAuth access token and refresh token and then make new tokens persistent for next use.
        Returns:
        this for Fluent Interface design.
        Throws:
        SmintIoAuthenticatorException - in case no refresh token is available, invalid, has expired or the Smint.io API rejected the refresh token.
